description:
Back to basics. Sometimes a pared back tool is the best thing for the job. Perfect for multi-day adventures, this bag shaves grams by leaving frills out of the picture. Its airy mesh suspension is light, and sends cool air across your sweat-soaked back. A simple pocket design lets you stay organized, with fewer places to accidentally lose your backcountry essentials. For a season of coastal hikes and high routes, this pack is no nonsense, lots of comfort, and all function.

  • Airspeed suspension system uses tensioned mesh to float the load on your back, while allowing air flow
  • Harness is easy to adjust, with up to 12cm of back length adjustment
  • Women's specific harness fits female or narrow-framed hikers
  • Construction combines 600-denier and 450-denier polyester with a 1000-denier nylon base for durability in backcountry use
  • Soft edged shoulder straps feature an adjustable sternum strap and integrated safety whistle
  • Integrated rain cover gives you weather protection whenever you need it
  • Hydration sleeve accommodates a 3L bladder (sold separately)
  • Fixed lid with double buckles allows easy top access
  • Separated sleeping bag compartment has bottom zipper access
  • Stretch mesh side pockets add extra storage for frequently used items
  • Compression straps keep your load tight and tidy, or strap on poles
  • Sewn loops on both sides lets you clip on extras or bulky gear
  • Padded hip belt positions weight comfortably
  • Zippered hip belt pocket keeps small items accessible
  • Recommended load: 11-16kg
name: Osprey Renn 50L Backpack - Women's
